    • remove

      @DeleteMapping(path="/{companyId}") @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) void remove(@PathVariable("companyId") Integer companyId)

      @PostMapping(path="/{companyId}/headquarters", consumes="application/json") @Secured({"ROLE_ADMIN","ROLE_COMPANY_MANAGER"}) @ResponseStatus(CREATED) CompanyHeadquartersResponseDTO addHeadquarters(@PathVariable("companyId") Integer companyId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid CreateHeadquartersRequestDTO toAddData)

    • headquarters

      @GetMapping(path="/{companyId}/headquarters", produces="application/json") @Secured({"ROLE_ADMIN","ROLE_COMPANY_MANAGER","ROLE_EMPLOYEE"}) Set<CompanyHeadquartersResponseDTO> headquarters(@PathVariable("companyId") Integer companyId)

    • update

      @PutMapping(path="/{companyId}/headquarters/{headquartersId}", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") @Secured({"ROLE_ADMIN","ROLE_COMPANY_MANAGER"}) @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) CompanyHeadquartersResponseDTO update(@PathVariable("companyId") Integer companyId, @PathVariable("headquartersId") Integer headquartersId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid UpdateHeadquartersRequestDTO updatedData)

    • removeHeadquarters

      @DeleteMapping(path="/{companyId}/headquarters/{headquartersId}") @Secured({"ROLE_ADMIN","ROLE_COMPANY_MANAGER"}) @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) void removeHeadquarters(@PathVariable("companyId") Integer companyId, @PathVariable("headquartersId") Integer headquartersId)
